document_data.mainbody:
The Kings Ride Inn was a quality tavern and inn in the town of Kings Reach in the late 14 century DR.
In the late 14 century DR, The Kings Ride Inn was one of two inns in Kings Reach. It had better quality rooms and food between the two. It catered mostly to merchants traveling the Vast, who generally were uninterested in mingling with the locals or sharing drinks with adventurers.
Unsurprisingly, The Kings Ride Inn offered meals and lodgings to its guests. A room was rented at five gold pieces per night food was included in the price.
Circa the , the inn was run by a single proprietor, and the staff included a waitress.
